translation: Know also, O best among the twice-born! the names of those who are the most distinguished amongst ourselves, the leaders of my army; these I name to you for your information.
commentary: 1.7 Our ours? You also? Specifics the best? Ye who (those)? tan those? Nibodh know (thou)? Dwijottama (O) best among the twicorn ones? Heroes the leaders? My my? of the army? for noun for information? Tan them? I speak speak? and to thee.No Commentary.
